feature.name: Tides of Chaos
feature.shortDescription: Once per rest, you can manipulate the forces of chance and chaos to gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. A Wild Magic Surge will result during some future spell casting.

effect.name: Wild Magic Surge
effect.shortDescription: Any time before you regain the use of this feature, the DM can have you roll on the Wild Magic Surge Table immediately after you cast a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher. You then regain the use of this feature.
